about_the_game:
This is a VR casual 3D golf mini-game, players can control the game through the controller, and hit the golf ball into the designated position to clear the level and unlock the next level.



The game has a total of 6 levels, each with different terrain or obstacles, and players need to adjust their strategies and skills according to different environments and conditions. During the game, players need to master a certain amount of strength and direction in order to accurately hit the golf ball into the designated position.
This game is not very difficult, and the VR equipment will be very fun and relaxing for players to use, while exercising players' reflexes and hand-eye coordination, it can also allow players to experience the fun of golf in an immersive way.



Operation method：
Using the golf club to hit the golf ball into the hole that under big red arrow
walk : Left handle up / down / left / right
Turn : Right handle left / right
Menu : Any handle menu key
